mulinma lod kokta thibuna abhiyogaya wune film eka hadanna widiyo kamarawak hoyaganna eka.habayi wasanawata ee wade echchara mahansi nowi karaganna mansta puluwan wunalu.mokada ee dawaswala tharabasu laga aluthinma gaththu widiyo kam ekak thibuna.ithin lod podi batar parak gawata passe film eka widiyo karanna thamange kam eka denna tharabasu kamathi wunalu.film eke sahaya adhyakshaka wune ithin wenin kawuruwath neweyi, ape purupuru.dan lodtayi purupurutayi eelagata thibune film ekata oone naluwo tika thoraganna eka.

‚Äúawath shariputhra sthawirayan wahansa, me shasanayehi yam mahanek itha pirisidu (kelesmala sun) minisasa ikma siti diwaasin sahasralokadhathuwa bala da, awath shariputhra sthawirayan wahansa, yam se as athi purushayek warapahathalamathata giye (pahapiriwenhi naba pihiti) nimmadulu dahas yam se balanne we da, awath shariputhra sthawirayan wahansa, ee mahana eparidden ma minisasa ikma siti pirisidu diwaasin sahasralokadhathuwa balayi.

anek wawima gath kala eya niya wawimayi.eyada dan kal yal pana giya wilasithawak wuwada nawathama muhunuwara samagin eya dinen dina idiriyata pamine."api wawamu...apima kamu"yana sankalpaya yatathe niyapothu wawa kanno da sitithi.niya pothu aaharayata ganimen kusaginna niwa ganimata nohaki wana namuth niya wardhanayata ha warna ganwim walata nokarana deyak natha.ma danna paridi eyata tharaga nomathi namuth salakiya yuthu thathwayak atha.ee gana mage amanapayak nathath kanthawan sadaha eya wadagath lakshanayak wiya haka.eyata nisi thana labe nam apa rate gowinta nisi thana nolabenne ayi da yanna mage prashnayayi.owun "api wawamu..rata nagamu"yana sankalpayata ekaga we nam nisi thana labiya yuthumaya.ema thana gowiyata labena thek "wawanno dinanno"yana themawata mage manapaya wenuwata amanapaya ek kota thabami.
